name: Roll or Dice
description:
ROLL OR DICE is a semi-rage game where you have to roll a dice and avoid tokens on the way to reach the goal!

With 10 levels to roll, you will encounter different types of tokes for you to avoid:

Red Token
  • Moves up can down.
 Blue Token
  • Moves in a circular pattern.

High Token

  • Bounces on platforms and other High Tokes.

 Wild Token

  • Quickly Bounces other Wild Tokes, ignoring the platform.

(Submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2022)
